device.name: i3c_wire
device.documentation: The <class>i3c_wire</class> implements bridge functionality between two <class>i3c_link</class> endpoints. It will forward everything from one side to another without analyzing. To use this device, connect i3c_link[0]/I3C_PORT[0] to one endpoint and i3c_link[1]/I3C_PORT[1] to another endpoint
